body.p:
Brownsville KY FebApril 4th 1861
To Hon Beriah Magoffin Govener of Ky

your Petitioner would Respectfully Represent to your Honor that Whereas Charles Merideth was Fined fifty Dollars at the March Term of 1860 of the Edmondson Equity & Criminal Court For carry conceal Deadly weapons We would Represent To your Honor that the said Meridith is Surveyor of Edmondson County and Consequently Travels a good deal of a night and Balleaved that he had a right by Law to Carry the same We would Represent to your Honor that the said Merideth is a good and Peasible Citizen and a Poore Man and Has a Family to support and Think under all the Circumstances that it Would be a Great Hardship for him to Have to pay the said Fine and We think that it would be but Just and Wrigh that the said Fine should be Remited Wherefore we pray your Honor to remit the said Fine and by so doing you will Confer a Lasting Favor on a Poore Family and your Petitioners

H B McLutin Clerk of Edmondson Circuit Court
